Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Covered Carriage
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A horse-drawn four-wheeled vehicle used to transport people. This particular carriage uses leather strapping suspension, making it more comfortable than otherwise. Can fit three passengers, plus the driver.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x3
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Hay
